function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High requirement of technical personnel and high costs","Impact":"Potential for limited access to effective disinfection due to technical expertise and cost constraints","Mitigation":"Invest in training and education for technical personnel, seek cost-effective disinfection solutions","Technologies":"Chemical, Microwave, High temperature steam","People":"Facility managers, disinfection personnel","Owner":"Facility management, disinfection personnel"},{"Description":"Residual disinfectants after disinfection","Impact":"Risk of chemical residue exposure and environmental contamination","Mitigation":"Use technologies with low residual disinfectants, implement thorough cleaning processes after disinfection","Technologies":"Chemical, Microwave, High temperature steam","People":"Cleaning staff, facility occupants, environmental regulators","Owner":"Facility management, environmental regulators"},{"Description":"Relative narrow disinfection spectrum and complex impact factors","Impact":"Potential for ineffective disinfection in certain scenarios, leading to disease propagation","Mitigation":"Consider combination of disinfection methods to cover broad spectrum, conduct detailed impact assessments for specific scenarios","Technologies":"Microwave, High temperature steam","People":"Facility managers, disinfection personnel","Owner":"Facility management"}]}
